sentence.text: The gene that encodes C1q/TNF-related protein 5 (protein secretion), a secreted protein of the C1q family, is mutated in individuals with late-onset retinal degeneration.
Adipose expression of protein secretion was markedly upregulated in obese and diabetic humans and in genetic and dietary models of obesity in rodents.
Inhibition of protein secretion action may result in the alleviation of insulin resistance associated with obesity and diabetes
